resources.string: Netology. University of Internet Professions of the Future

Hello, this is the new Netology! Once Netology began with online marketing intensives. Then came design courses, development, analytics and management. We grow ourselves and help you grow students: from beginners to confident professionals. But the most important thing remains with us: we believe that in everyone already has a power that makes you want more, aim higher, run faster.
